name: Law Offices of Tim Powers
overview:
The Law Office of Tim Powers located in Denton, Texas, serves clients throughout Denton County including the cities of Carrollton, Flower Mound, Lewisville, Little Elm, and Argyle. With a team of four lawyers, the Law Offices of Tim Powers provides counsel for criminal defense and family law with an emphasis on working with clients who are facing DWI, drug, and felony criminal charges.

Serving clients since 1997, the Law Offices of Tim Powers has earned an outstanding reputation in Denton and throughout North Texas. Known for providing aggressive defense, the firm’s founder and managing attorney, Tim Powers holds experience defending clients in over 5,000 criminal cases. His firm also represents Spanish speakers and non-citizens.

Before founding his firm, Mr. Powers worked as Denton County assistant district attorney and chief misdemeanor prosecutor. He earned his Juris Doctor from Tulane University School of Law with cum laude distinction and holds a Master of Business Administration as well. Outside of managing his legal practice and overseeing the daily operations of the firm, he acts as a professor at the University of North Texas where he teaches classes on criminal procedure and criminal law. He holds membership with Denton Bar Association, the Texas Criminal Defense Lawyers Association, and the National College of DUI Defense.

Through his firm, Mr. Powers contributes to a number of charitable outreach programs in North Texas including the Denton State School, the local chapters of the Boys and Girls Club of America, the Salvation Army, and Operation Kindness. He also maintains a blog geared toward legal education. To learn more about his practice, visit www.timpowers.com
